mapper.sql: role_id, role_name, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, is_delete
mapper.update: update tb_role set is_delete = 1 where role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_role (role_id, role_name, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, is_delete) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
